# VEHICLE::SET_BOAT_REMAINS_ANCHORED_WHILE_PLAYER_IS_DRIVER

## Summary
Set this to true on boats which should remain anchored even when a player is driving it

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** forcePlayerBoatAnchorFlag
